Document.Title: Visual Studio 2008: Specifying the Default Browser for Web Projects

Content:
With the Web Project node selected in the Project Explorer, you can select File > Browse With… or you can right-click on the node for a context menu Browse With… command.

For more, see “Browse With Dialog Box” here:

    http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/c1wa9c6k(VS.71).aspx
